task.title: Adding Existing Items to Collections
task.shortdesc: You can add existing items from your library to collections in order to help organize items into collections where they fit best.

context.p: Adding existing items to collections is useful when organizing items that you have previously collected into new collections.

step.cmd: Select an existing item(s) from your library in the center pane
Drag and drop the selected items from the center pane to the collection in the left pane
step.info: By default, the items will be added to the new collection but won't be removed from their original location.
